site.name: Mary’s Coffee House Paraguay
site.description: Specialty coffee in Asunción. Barista training, courses and consulting — a classic experience with a harmonious spirit.

hero.title: Mary’s Coffee House
hero.subtitle: Specialty coffee with a classic soul
hero.text: A place to return to the essentials: great coffee, thoughtful service, and a daily ritual with a harmonious touch.

list.title: Specialty coffee
list.text: Careful extractions and classic drinks with consistent quality.

list.title: Perfect pairings
list.text: Sweet and savory options to match every cup — from breakfast to afternoon treats.

list.title: Courses & consulting
list.text: Barista training and consulting to elevate coffee standards.

visit.title: Visit us
visit.text: Lillo 1178 & Malutín — Asunción. Come for coffee, stay for the moment.

items.name: Iced Latte
items.desc: Chilled latte, perfect for warm days.

products.name: House Cookies
products.long: A classic pairing for espresso, cappuccino or latte — perfect for a quick, delicious break.

products.name: Cake of the Day
products.long: Flavors rotate depending on availability — ask for today’s option.

paragraphs: Mary’s Coffee House is dedicated to specialty coffee, with a classic identity and service focused on detail.
Beyond serving coffee, we share knowledge: barista courses and consulting for those who want to level up.

team.name: Mary’s Team
team.bio: We care for every cup — from extraction to the full experience.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Excellent coffee and very thoughtful service. The place feels classic and calm.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Great spot in Asunción: well-made drinks and tasty options to pair.

items.author: Verified customer
items.text: Very good specialty coffee. Highly recommend the classics.

seo.title: Specialty coffee in Asunción | Mary’s Coffee House
seo.description: Mary’s Coffee House Paraguay: specialty coffee in Asunción, barista courses and consulting. Visit us at Lillo 1178 & Malutín.
